lines.text: What do kids eat? That's easy. Soft stuff; no bones, no potato chips. What did you eat when you were a baby?
Gee, I wonder if I looked like that when I was delivered by the stork.
When you were born, you were delivered by a buzzard.
Wait till you see the meal we have for you - fit for a king. Even better, fit for an airplane worker.
I'd like to meet the guy who invented these barbed-wire pineapples!
